description: This file is a C++ header defining an interface IController within the WPEFramework PluginHost namespace. It declares pure virtual methods for controlling system states such as persist, delete, reboot, environment, configuration, and clone, indicating it serves as an interface for deprecated controller functionalities.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface for controlling system state and configuration, marked as deprecated.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persist the current state or configuration.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Delete the specified resource at the given path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieve the environment associated with a given index.

methods.name: Configuration (getter)
methods.description: Retrieve configuration for the specified callsign.

methods.name: Configuration (setter)
methods.description: Set configuration for the specified callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Clone the configuration from a base callsign to a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
